Bravo Awards 2024

On Monday, 12th May, we welcomed our Bravo Award winners from around the region to the UAE as part of their well-deserved recognition, celebrating their achievements alongside our leadership team. As part of their reward, Bravo winners were invited for a two-day visit to the UAE. While 12th May was dedicated to celebrations and engagements with our team, the winners were free to celebrate the second day as they wished. 

Congratulations once again to all our Bravo winners – you make us proud!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Tanagra x Reflections Copenhagen

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1104&user=10620>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Tanagra x Reflections Copenhagen

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1104&user=10620> 	

Tanagra celebrated Reflections Copenhagen's 10th year anniversary with an event launching its latest collection, The Radiant Reflection.

Held at Onda Replenishment Bar in Dubai, the celebration brought together the founder of the brand Andrea Larsson alongside press, influencers, and VIP guests for an exclusive unveiling. 

As part of the milestone, the brand collaborated with Tanagra to create three exclusive pieces that embody the spirit of the new collection. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/c9f0ddf73f1a77cc27771c0f5badc0eb930418296.png> 	

Last Day of Sustainability Week


The journey doesn’t end here.
Let’s carry the spirit of this week into everything we do — today and beyond.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/2c05af9d9aa693ff3ac06bd7b2a611031134995679.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

Returning dads with Nihad

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/2c05af9d9aa693ff3ac06bd7b2a611031134995679.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

Returning dads with Nihad

As Father’s Day approaches, we welcomed back Nihad Abdulnazir from the Sustainability Team after his one-month parental leave. He shared how the time off allowed him to embrace early fatherhood, spend Eid with his family, and witness precious milestones. Despite stepping away during a busy period, he felt supported by his team and grateful to work in a company that truly values family, mental wellbeing, and work-life balance. 
Nihad returns recharged and appreciative, encouraging all parents balancing work and family to take it one step at a time.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/4affd14673e664d587d112d9672c218a1190709316.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Farm Rio Early Access Sale

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1105&user=10620> 	

Enjoy a flat 50% off selected items until May 31st in our Mall of THE Emirates store or online HERE <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1105&user=10620> . To avail your exclusive discount online, simply log in and use code CHALHOUB50 at check-out.

Happy shopping!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

Yas Island Summer Offer
